effect.scarlet_violet: Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled. This ability has no effect in battle.
effect.the_teal_mask: Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled. This ability has no effect in battle.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled. This ability has no effect in battle.

flavor_text.the_teal_mask: By illuminating its surroundings, the Pokémon prevents its accuracy from being lowered.
